sourcesContent:
import { Container, Typography, Grid, Card, CardContent, CardMedia, Box, Divider, Stack, Chip, useTheme, Avatar } from '@mui/material'; import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles'; import { useColorMode } from '../App'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; const StyledSection = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({ marginBottom: theme.spacing(6), })); const teamMembers = [ { name: 'John Doe', role: 'Frontend Developer', contributions: 'UI design, React components, dashboard', color: '#1976d2' // Primary color for avatar }, { name: 'Jane Smith', role: 'Backend Developer', contributions: 'APIs, file upload, JWT auth', color: '#009688' // Teal color for avatar }, { name: 'Alex Roy', role: 'AI Engineer', contributions: 'Chart recommendation engine', color: '#673ab7' // Deep Purple for avatar }, { name: 'Priya Patel', role: 'Full-stack', contributions: 'MongoDB schema, integration, bug fixing', color: '#ff5722' // Deep Orange for avatar } ]; const techStack = [ 'React.js', 'Material UI', 'Node.js', 'Express', 'MongoDB', 'Mongoose', 'Chart.js' ]; export default function AboutUs() { const theme = useTheme(); const { mode } = useColorMode(); return ( {/* Mission Section */} About DataViz Pro Transforming data visualization through AI-powered insights DataViz Pro revolutionizes how you interact with data by automatically recommending the most effective visualizations for your datasets. Our platform combines cutting-edge AI with intuitive design to make data visualization accessible to everyone. {/* Features Section */} Key Features Smart Upload Seamless CSV/JSON file upload with automatic data parsing AI Recommendations Intelligent chart suggestions based on your data structure Interactive Charts Dynamic, responsive visualizations powered by Chart.js {/* Tech Stack Section */} Tech Stack {techStack.map((tech) => ( ))} {/* Team Section with LinkedIn Badge */} Meet Our Team {/* Simple wrapper div with LinkedIn badge */}
{mode === 'light' ? (
Aaditya Desai
) : (
Aaditya Desai
)}
{/* Fallback if badge doesn't load */} Team Lead: Aaditya Desai View LinkedIn Profile {/* Future Scope Section */} Future Scope We're constantly working to enhance DataViz Pro. Our roadmap includes: Excel and spreadsheet support Real-time collaboration features Cloud storage integration Advanced AI-powered analytics ); }
